/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are modern and tall, their facades adorned with a multitude of windows that reflect the overcast sky. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. On the sidewalks, pedestrians can be seen going about their day, adding a human element to the urban landscape. The color palette of the image is dominated by shades of gray and brown, reflecting the overcast sky and the earthy tones of the buildings. Despite the absence of vibrant colors, the image conveys a sense of the city's dynamic energy and architectural grandeur.
